forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. Southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 4pm. Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle shroud of clouds blankets the city, hinting at the moisture settling in for a chilly day. The air feels moist and carries a muted promise of rain, with temperatures hovering around a cool 51 degrees, destined to reach a modest high of 59. The southeast wind whispers through the streets, occasionally picking up strength, rustling the trees and weaving through the alleys. A chance of rain looms, thick with anticipation, as the day unravels its cloudy tapestry, casting a grey hue over the iconic vistas.

While the crisp air invites a brisk morning walk, it also beckons you to wear layers; a light jacket or sweater will serve you well against the biting breeze. A stroll towards the waterfront could prove rewarding, the sound of the waves complementing the rhythmic pulse of the city, as cafes brew warmth and comfort for those seeking refuge from the impending drizzle. Whether it’s a visit to a quiet bookstore to lose yourself in pages or a leisurely exploration of the local artisan stalls, today offers a canvas for understated pleasures amidst the encroaching clouds.
